column.name: goal
column.comment: Enter the free shipping threshold. Buyers whose orders reach this amount will receive delivery for free

column.name: first_message
column.comment: Enter the initial message in the free shipping bar displayed to buyers

column.name: below_goal_message
column.comment: Enter the second message when buyers' orders haven't reached the goal

column.name: achieve_message
column.comment: Enter the congratulation message when buyers' orders reach the goal

column.name: clickable
column.comment: If Yes, the bar can be clicked to link to a different URL

column.name: open_new_page
column.comment: Select Yes to open the link in a new tab

column.name: exclude_pages
column.comment: Enter handle name(s) of page(s) NOT to display free shipping bars. Page(s) are separated by line breaks.
